ItemConsumable.name: protein bar
ItemConsumable.description: A brown cakelike mass containing lumps of protein. Despite its consistency this is a savoury product that while entirely synthetic is nevertheless rich in nutrition.
ItemConsumable.effectrecover: The bar has a sticky consistency that really should come with a degree of sweetening to make it more palatable. Nevertheless despite its juxtaposition of cake texture and savoury nutty flavours the bar is quite filling and should help keep you going.
